H0.text: Songwriter/manager/producer Stig Anderson was often known as the fifth member of which group. The Beatles

H1.text: Songwriter/manager/producer Stig Anderson was often known as the fifth member of which group. Roxette

H2.text: Songwriter/manager/producer Stig Anderson was often known as the fifth member of which group. Ace of Base

H3.text: Songwriter/manager/producer Stig Anderson was often known as the fifth member of which group. Abba

A4.text: Sometimes referred to as the 'fifth member' of ABBA, Anderson also owned the band's record label and publishing company.
